id: Idaho's GOP governor endorses Medicaid expansion ballot measure
paragraph: By Tami Luhby, CNNUpdated 7:11 PM ET, Tue October 30, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Idaho Gov. Butch Otter, a Republican, endorsed a grass-roots effort to expand Medicaid in his state on Tuesday.
